name: Alter Tales of Ubuntu
description:
Two alters solve puzzles in a Utopian Africa in the '70s.

In Alter: Tales of Ubuntu, you play as a polymorphic character that has to solve pattern and memory puzzles, in a Utopian African city in the '70s. Each character sees the world differently, and each challenge is specially tailored to the character's behavior.

Play as Haki and Niyara, and try to understand what is happening, and who is making you solve all of these challenges.

  • Two personalities stuck in the same body, try to understand their purpose.
  • Explore an African Sci-Fi environment in the '70s, in the fictional country of Ubuntu.
  • Each character sees the world differently and reacts according to their emotions.
Controls
  • WASD to move.
  • TAB to check the inventory.
  • LEFT CLICK to interact.
  • SPACE to progress the dialogue.
  • ESC to access the pause menu.
